pageContent.longDescription: Pizza Margherita is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.
A pizza topped with cheese and ham
A foldable pizza with a crispy outer crust and baked in a wood burning oven
A thick cut of pizza with pillowy dough, a crunchy crust, and robust tomato sauce.
Pizza Margherita is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.
A pizza topped with cheese and ham
A foldable pizza with a crispy outer crust and baked in a wood burning oven
A thick cut of pizza with pillowy dough, a crunchy crust, and robust tomato sauce.
